main event: Witness observed a strange object hovering over their ranch near Vernon, Texas, on September 23, 1963.
interesting points: The object was seen hovering 300-500 feet above the ground for 7-8 minutes., It appeared to have a bright red light that blinked on and off., The object made no sound that could be heard., It took off at a high rate of speed and disappeared in a matter of seconds., Check with DRAGNET revealed no aircraft or missile in the area at the time.
sighted object: a strange hovering object with a bright red light
witness description: the ranch owner observed the object
